name: Ancient run
description:
Try to reach 1000 points, also you can write your result in the comments :)

This game is a continuation of the game, about the dinosaur, when you turn off the Internet in Google.

Game for jam.

How to play:

  • To start the game, click the left mouse button on the screen.
  • To jump, click the left mouse button on the screen.
  • To start, click the left button again on the screen.
  • For any incomprehensible question, click the left mouse button on the screen.
